column4: Hey -- is there a shortcut to switch between windows of the focused application (i couldn't find the answer searching)
like an ALT-TAB for the focused application
depends; it can be alt+left arrow and alt+right arrow for most web browsers
in Unity you can hold down super and it shows you the keyboard shortcuts. I found a screenshot of this (it doesn't work in Unity2D) and the shortcut is alt-grave. try it :D
